The total estimated cost of the Chesapeake Bay Bridge and approaches.
Millers Island-Tolchester Site, before interest during construction and
bond discount, herein presented, may be subject to modification if this bridge
is authorized to proceed at any time in the future by the State Roads Com-
mission, since there have been no surveys and borings made at the site of
the bridge fixed by the United States War Department.

CONCLUSIONS AND RECOMMENDATIONS

The conclusions to be drawn from the foregoing report on the Chesapeake
Bay Bridge may be summarized as follows:
(1) The three Bay ferries now operating between the Eastern and Western
